title: Mobile Game-Based Mathematics Learning Engagement Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Gamification-enhanced program for improving mathematical concept comprehension and engagement in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve linear equations with over 80% accuracy through game-based mechanisms.
Learners consistently engage in daily 20+ minute mobile game-based learning activities.
Learners can explain at least three problem-solving strategies using in-game feedback systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
